info.title: Azure Arc Connected OpenStack Management Service API
info.description: Self service experience for Azure Connected OpenStack.

get.description: Returns list of all operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Implements virtual machine GET method.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: API to update certain properties of the virtual machine resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Virtual machine properties to update. Only tags are supported.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

virtualMachineName.description: virtualMachineName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: identityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

virtualMachineConfig.description: virtualMachineConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

userDataBase64.description: The virtualMachine userdata in base64 string format.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

powerState.description: The Virtual Machine power state (example: Running, Stopped).

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

VirtualMachineHardwareProfile.description: Defines the virtual machine hardware properties.

ramSize.description: ramSize is the size of a virtual machine's memory, in MB.

vcpus.description: The number of vCPUs for the vm.

diskSize.description: Disk size of a virtual machine, in GB.

VirtualMachineNetworkProfile.description: Defines the virtual machine network profile properties.

networkInterfaces.description: Network interfaces of a virtual machine.

VirtualMachineNetworkInterface.description: Defines the virtual machine network interface properties.

fixedIps.description: Fixed IPs associated to a virtual machine network interface.

fixedIp.description: Fixed IP associated to a virtual machine network interface.

macAddress.description: MAC address associated to a virtual machine network interface.

AttachDetachVolumeVirtualMachineOptions.description: Defines the volume attach/detach action properties.

volumeId.description: volumeId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack Volume.

AttachDetachNetworkPortVirtualMachineOpt.description: Defines the network port attach/detach action properties.

networkPortId.description: networkPortId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack Neutron Port.

SnapshotVirtualMachineOptions.description: Defines the virtual machine snapshot properties.

imageName.description: imageName is the resource reference Id to the Openstack Glance image that will be created.

identityName.description: identityName is the OpenStack resource name.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

imageName.description: imageName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

imageConfig.description: imageConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

diskFormat.description: DiskFormat is the format of the disk (e.g. ami, ari, aki, vhd, vhdx, vmdk, raw, qcow2, vdi, iso, etc). Make sure that the openstack cloud supports the specified image format, otherwise convert it first

containerFormat.description: ContainerFormat is the format of the container. Valid values are ami, ari, aki, bare, and ovf. Default: bare

isHidden.description: isHidden is whether the image is listed in default image list or not.

imageUrl.description: Image url is the public HTTP(S) endpoint from where the image can be downloaded.

minDisk.description: MinDisk is the minimum amount of disk a flavor must have to be able to create a server based on the image, measured in GB.

minRam.description: MinRam is the minimum amount of RAM a flavor must have to be able to create a server based on the image, measured in MB.

imageProperties.description: imageProperties provides free-form key/value pairs that further describe the image, which are used by Nova for scheduling instances.

isProtected.description: isProtected checks whether the image is not deletable.

imageTags.description: A list of tags to associate with the Image.

visibility.description: Visibility defines who can see/use the image.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

keypairName.description: keypairName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

keypairConfig.description: keypairConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

publicKey.description: The public ssh key to import.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

networkName.description: networkName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

networkConfig.description: networkConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

isShared.description: Whether the network can be used by other tenants (projects).

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

subnetName.description: subnetName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

subnetConfig.description: subnetConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

networkId.description: networkId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack Network.

allocationPools.description: AllocationPool represents a sub-range of cidr available for dynamic allocation to ports.

cidr.description: CIDR is the address CIDR of the subnet.

dnsNameservers.description: DNSNameservers are the nameservers to be set via DHCP.

enableDhcp.description: EnableDHCP will either enable or disable the DHCP service.

gatewayIP.description: GatewayIP sets gateway information for the subnet.

hostRoutes.description: HostRoutes are any static host routes to be set via DHCP.

ipVersion.description: IPVersion is the IP version for the subnet.

ipv6AddressMode.description: The IPv6 address modes specifies mechanisms for assigning IPv6 IP addresses.

ipv6RaMode.description: The IPv6 router advertisement specifies whether the networking service should transmit ICMPv6 packets.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

volumeName.description: volumeName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

volumeConfig.description: volumeConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

volumeMetadata.description: One or more metadata key and value pairs to associate with the volume.

multiAttachEnabled.description: multiAttachEnabled denotes if the volume is multi-attach capable.

size.description: The size of the volume in GB.

sourceImageId.description: The ID of the image from which to create the volume. Required to create a bootable volume.

sourceVolumeId.description: The ID of the existing volume to clone.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

heatStackName.description: heatStackName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

heatStackConfig.description: heatStackConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

disableRollback.description: Enables or disables deletion of all stack resources when a stack creation fails.

environmentBase64.description: Heat environment file represented as a base64 string, as an alternative to the environment file url.

heatStackParameters.description: User-defined parameters to pass to the Heat Stack.

heatStackTags.description: A list of tags to associate with the Heat Stack.

templateBase64.description: Heat Template represented as a base64 string, as an alternative to the template url.

heatStackTemplateId.description: heatStackTemplateId is the resource reference Id to the Heat Stack Template. It takes precedence over the other template and environment options.

timeoutMins.description: The timeout for Heat Stack creation in minutes.

heatOutput.description: The HeatStack output information in JSON string format.

heatResources.description: The HeatStack resources that were created during the deployment.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

HeatStackResource.description: Defines the heat stack resource properties.

resourceType.description: The HeatStackResource type, using Heat's terminology (example: heat_server, het_server_port).

resourceName.description: The HeatStackResource OpenStack internal resource name.

resourceUuid.description: The HeatStackResource OpenStack internal resource UUID.

resourceStatus.description: The HeatStackResource OpenStack internal resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

heatStackTemplateName.description: heatStackTemplateName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

heatStackTemplateConfig.description: heatStackTemplateConfig is the OpenStack resource configuration.

ignoreErrors.description: A list of comma separated error codes to ignore when running pre-checks.

showNested.description: Set to true to include nested stacks in the list.

environmentBase64.description: Heat environment file represented as a base64 string, as an alternative to the environment file url.

templateBase64.description: Heat Template represented as a base64 string, as an alternative to the template url.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

flavorName.description: flavorName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

flavorConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

diskSize.description: The amount of root disk space, measured in GB.

ephemeralDiskSize.description: The amount of ephemeral disk space, measured in GB.

flavorIdentifier.description: A unique ID for the flavor. This is optional.

isPublic.description: IsPublic flags a flavor as being available to all projects or not.

ramSize.description: The amount of RAM memory, measured in MB.

swapSize.description: The amount of swap space, measured in MB.

vcpus.description: The number of vcpus for the flavor.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

securityGroupName.description: securityGroupName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

securityGroupConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

description.description: The description of the security group.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

securityGroupRuleName.description: securityGroupRuleName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

securityGroupRuleConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

direction.description: The direction in which the security group rule is applied. Allowed values: ingress or egress.

ethertype.description: Must be IPv4 or IPv6, and addresses represented in CIDR must match the ingress or egress rules.

portRangeMax.description: The maximum port number in the range that is matched by the security group rule.

portRangeMin.description: The minimum port number in the range that is matched by the security group rule.

protocol.description: The protocol that is matched by the security group rule. Valid values are 'tcp', 'udp', 'icmp' or an empty string.

remoteIpPrefix.description: The remote IP prefix to be associated with this security group rule.

securityGroupId.description: The security group id for the security group rule.

remoteSecurityGroupId.description: The remote security group id for the security group rule.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

volumeTypeName.description: volumeTypeName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

volumeTypeConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

extraSpecs.description: The Cinder Volume Type extra specs.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

networkPortName.description: NetworkPortName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

networkPortConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

isForwardingPackets.description: Administrative state of port. If false (down), port does not forward packets. Defaults to true.

allowedAddressPairs.description: A set of zero or more allowed address pair objects each where address pair object contains an ipAddress and mac_address.

subnetId.description: subnetId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack subnet.

fixedIps.description: A set of zero or more allowed address pair objects each where address pair object contains an ipAddress and mac_address.

networkId.description: networkId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack Network.

securityGroupIds.description: securityGroupIds are the resource reference ids to the SecurityGroups resources.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

volumeSnapshotName.description: VolumeSnapshotName is the OpenStack resource name.

identityId.description: IdentityId is the resource reference Id to the Openstack credentials.

volumeSnapshotConfig.description: The desired configuration for the resource

forceSnapshot.description: Forcefully snapshot attached volumes. Default: true.

metadata.description: One or more metadata key and value pairs to associate with the volume snapshot.

volumeId.description: The reference of the volume to snapshot.

importConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

openStackStatus.description: openStackStatus describes the OpenStack resource status.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

ResourcePatchTags.description: Object containing updates for minimal patch operations.

GenericImportConfig.description: The import config. If set, the existing OpenStack resource will be imported to Azure.

id.description: The OpenStack resource id used for import.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is data action or not.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of operations.

provisioningStateProperties.description: Common provisioning state for all the resources.

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request. Supported-format: yyyy-MM-dd(+ '-preview,-alpha,-beta,-rc,-privatepreview'.
